newsitem.title: CHINA: Paper selects China's top 10 listed firms.
newsitem.headline: Paper selects China's top 10 listed firms.

text.p: The China Securities Newspaper on Thursday published a list of the top 10 listed Chinese companies selected according to their interim results, topped by Jiangsu Chunlan Refrigerating Equipment.
Two B share companies were included in the list -- Shanghai Lujiazui Finance & Trade Zone Development and the Shenzhen-listed firm Anhui Gujing Distillery Co Ltd .

The paper said the companies, four listing in Shanghai and six in Shenzhen, were chosen on the basis of a number of factors including profit performance in their 1996 first-half results. It gave no details.
